title: Play-Based Learning Design Workshop for Cultivating Language Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education theory and management/leadership experience
context.additional_context: Necessity of establishing an interactive learning environment using digital devices.

learning_goals: Design three or more play-based learning activities applicable to language education environments
Execute strategies to promote team members' creative thinking through collaborative play activities using digital tools
Analyze formative assessment results and suggest improvements to the effectiveness of play-based learning
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
